alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 11:45PM CDT until June 05 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1145 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Aurora, or 20 miles west of York, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 328 and 339. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
